title: Quality of Life Improvement Strategy Design through Computer Literacy Education for the Elderly

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: A course strengthening the capacity of language professionals to design computer education programs for elderly learners.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more step-by-step educational modules to improve computer literacy among the elderly.
Learners can develop instructional strategies that induce changes in learners' attitudes toward computers and enhance self-efficacy.
Learners can apply two or more multidimensional assessment tools to measure quality of life (QOL) improvement effects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
